name: GalaxyFighter
description:
Small endless side-scrolling space shooter, accumulate points by defeating enemies while preventing them to get past you and dodging asteroids.

This is a prototype idea, which may lead to future full development of a game in this genre. It was created as part of a college project in game programming. All assets used in this game that were not created by me were free for use.

Currently, the game does not have a screen displaying controls so here they are:

on Keyboard Controller

W,A,S,D - Ship movement - Left Joystick

Left mouse button - Fire - Action button 1

Right Mouse Button - Swap weapon - Right Trigger Button
